item.description:
This is a joint event with the WiHST Meetup Group
Some casual relaxation with friends, lots of entertainment and enlightening discussion sparked by the "Black Bag Q&A" - beats the heck out of being stuck in summer weekend traffic to/from The Cape or The Berkshires!

We're making it a Pot-Luck evening to keep costs reasonable (BYO is always way cheaper than a restaurant or pub).

The event fee of $5.00 per person is to cover the rental of the lounge area and kitchen facilities.

Please choose one of the following items to bring and write it in your RSVP text/comments box when you RSVP (FYI: the dark blue items have already been selected):

(ALSO: Please bring appropriate serving utensils with your dish)

1. Appetizer 1 - for 6 people
2. Appetizer 2 - for 6 people
3. Appetizer 3 - for 6 people
4. Appetizer 4 - for 6 people
5. Appetizer 5 - for 6 people
6. Main Dish with Meat 1 - for 6 people
7. Main Dish with Meat 2 - for 6 people
8. Main Dish with Meat 3 - for 6 people
9. Large Pizza with meat
10. Large Pizza without meat
11. Main Dish Vegan/Vegetarian - for 6 people
12. Garden salad - for 12 people
13. Potato salad - for 6 people
14. Macaroni salad - for 6 people
15. Side dish 1 - for 6 people
16. Side dish 2 - for 6 people
17. Side dish 3 - for 6 people
18. Dessert 1 (fruit cake or pie) for 8 people
19. Dessert 2 (regular cake or pie) for 8 people
20. Dessert 3 (2 doz. brownies or cookies)
21. Dessert 4 (fruit plate) - enough for 6 people
22. Bottle of Rum
23. Bottle of Vodka
24. Soft Drinks - a case of mixed diet soda chilled in a cooler
25. Soft Drinks - a case of mixed regular chilled in a cooler
26. Beer - 12 pack chilled in a cooler
27. Beer - 12 pack chilled in a cooler
28. Red Wine - enough for 6 people
29. White Wine - enough for 6 people
30. Paper products, plastic cutlery, and trash bags.
31. 100th Event Cake

Please help with clean-up before going home.

Please pre-pay your event fee - this helps make life a bit easier for your organizers - and we avoid the problem of everyone @ the event needing change for a $20 bill!
item.how_to_find_us: The lounge is on the mezzanine level, up the stairs from the lobby. The folks at the reception desk will point the way.
item.name: Summer Saturday Pot-Luck Party
